definition: (archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
see 居禮夫人|居礼夫人[Ju1 li3 Fu1 ren5]

sentences.english: Bring radioactive, people naturally think of Curies.
sentences.chinese: 提起放射性，人們自然想到居里夫婦。

sentences.english: In 1904, Marie and Pierre Curie were given the Nobel Prize for physics.
sentences.chinese: 1904年居里夫婦獲得了諾貝爾物理獎。

sentences.english: Madame Curie warned learners not to go too fast.
sentences.chinese: 居里夫人告誡初學者不要圖快。

sentences.english: The Curies are best known for discovering radium.
sentences.chinese: 居里夫婦最爲出名的是發現了鐳。

sentences.english: Her laboratory is preserved at the Musee Curie.
sentences.chinese: 她的實驗室被保存在居里繆斯堂。

sentences.english: Madame Curie devoted all her time to the study of radium.
sentences.chinese: 居里夫人一生致力於鐳的研究。

sentences.english: The Curies won a Nobel Prize for their discovery.
sentences.chinese: 居里夫婦贏得了諾貝爾獎。

sentences.english: How to isolate radioactive elements was discovered by the Curis.
sentences.chinese: 如何分離放射性元素是居里夫婦發明的。

sentences.english: Fiennes climbed the mountain to raise funds for cancer charity Marie Curie.
sentences.chinese: 他此次攀登珠峯是爲了給居里癌症基金會籌款。

sentences.english: Madame Curie was one of the Greatest scientists in the world.
sentences.chinese: 居里夫人是世界裏最偉大的科學家之一。

sentences.english: An experiment method is introduced to observe the Curie temperature of magnetic materials.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種觀察磁性材料居里溫度的實驗方法。

sentences.english: Madame Curie didn't suffer as they did.
sentences.chinese: 居里夫人沒有向他們那樣受苦。

sentences.english: Madame Curie discovered the element radium.
sentences.chinese: 居里夫人發現了鐳元素。

sentences.english: A new method for determining Curie point of ferromagnetic minerals is introduced in this article.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種測試鐵磁性礦物居里點的新方法。

sentences.english: These scientists could not believe the Curies more.
sentences.chinese: 這些科學家完全相信居里夫婦。

definition: Yuanli town in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
warm room/warm partition of a room
reception pavilion (generally part of a large residence, and often built in a garden)
a room in a Buddhist monastery/a temple
